items.name: Fried Wonton
items.description: Deep fried wonton stuffed with ground chicken served with sweet & sour sauce.

items.name: Egg Rolls
items.description: Deep fried roll stuffed mixed vegetable, served with sweet & sour sauce.

items.name: Fried Tofu
items.description: Deep fried tofu served with sweet and sour sauce, topped with ground peanut.

items.name: Cheese Wonton
items.description: Deep fried pastry filled with a blend of cheese, served with sweet & sour sauce.

items.name: Butterfly Shrimp
items.description: Deep fried shrimp served with sweet & sour sauce.

items.name: Vegetable Tempura
items.description: Deep fried mixed vegetables, served with sweet & sour sauce.

items.name: Sexy Shrimp
items.description: Fried shrimp on a stick with seasoning served with sweet & sour sauce.

items.name: Shrimp Roll
items.description: Shrimp rolls wrapped in wonton skin, deep-fried and served with green salad and sweet and sour sauce.

items.name: Steamed or Fried Dumplings
items.description: Chicken dumpling, sered with green salad, sweet & sour dip or sweet black dip.

items.name: Satay Chicken
items.description: Sliced chicken on skewers, marinated in a mixture of Thai spices and coconut milk grilled, served with cucumber salad and peanut sauce.

items.name: Shrimp Cake
items.description: Deep fried mixed shrimp paste served with ground shrimp and water chestnut, with sweet & sour sauce.

items.name: Golden Wings
items.description: Deep-fried stuffed chicken wing with ground chicken and water chestnut, served wih sweet and sour sauce, topped with ground peanut and cucumber.

items.name: Combination Appetizer
items.description: Two butterfly shrimps, two egg rolls, five fried wontons. Served with sweet & sour sauce.

items.name: Tom Yum
items.description: Famous spicy and sour soup with lemongrass, galanga, mushroom, and cilantro.

items.name: Tom Kah
items.description: Rich flavored spicy and sour coconut milk soup with lemongrass, galanga, mushroom, onion, and cilantro.

items.name: Wonton Soup
items.description: Wonton wrapped with chicken or shrimp and vegetable in clear mild broth.

items.name: Noodle Soup
items.description: Thin rice noodle, bean sprouts, green onion, fried garlic, and cilantro in house cleaer broth.

items.name: Silver Noodle Soup
items.description: Silver noodles, white meat chicken, shrimp, mixed vegetables, fried garlic, and onion in mild clear broth.

items.name: Vegetable and Tofu Soup
items.description: Mixed vegetables in special clear broth.

items.name: House Salad
items.description: Hard boiled egg, fresh lettuce, cucumber, tomatoes, onion, carrot. Served with peanut dressing.

items.name: Yum-Yai Salad

items.name: Spicy Beef or Chicken Salad
items.description: Sliced beef or white chicken with cucumber, red onion, green onion, tomatoes, and cilantro mixed with spicy lime juice, served with fresh salad.

items.name: Larb Chicken
items.description: Ground chicken, onion, cilantro, and roated rice in spicy lime juice, served with fresh salad.

items.name: Spicy Shrimp Salad
items.description: Grilled shrimp with cucumber, onion, tomatoes and spicy lime dressing, served with fresh salad.

items.name: Silver Noodle Salad
items.description: Silver noodle, ground chicken, shrimp, onion, tomatoes, and cilantro, mixed with spicy lime juice, served wiith fresh salad.

items.name: Grilled Salmon Salad

items.name: Pad Thai

items.name: Pad Kee Mow (Spicy Noodles)

name: Curry
description: Choice of meat: White meat chicken, beef, tofu, vegetable, no meat.
additional: Shrimp $2.50, Combination(shrimp, beef, and chicken) add $2.50, Steamed Rice $2.50/ Brown Rice $3.00
